review: I owned an Apple TV before this. I almost didn't get this, but I got the promo with Sling TV, and purchased it for like 40 bucks.At this point, I would have bought it for the full 100. I like it more than I ever did the Apple TV.  It just does more, that and I really like the voice search feature.  You simply hold down the mic button on the remote and say what you want to find, and it finds it fast. The remote is also small, bug bigger than the to small Apple TV remote.I have had fewer problems with wireless networking related to this as I have had with my Apple TV. Also I do do most of my digital rentals through Amazon due to the larger range of devices I can view them on. Apple TV doesn't offer Amazon, and I don't feel i should have to trick it by screen mirroring my ipad.Overall I really like the Amazon Fire TV.  I'm thinking about getting one of the game controllers and picking up a couple games.
